summary:
I am curious toward new things, and I am looking for stimulating activities with a sustained work pace. I place an equal emphasis to produce quality work and to see a project go through.

Cumulating over 10 years of experience in the field of medical device engineering , I have occupied various role from electronic verification and validation engineer, certification and system validation engineer to Quality management positions.

I have worked on various types of device ranging from medical grade IT to Active implant medical device, and in various fields, cardiac rhythm management, hepatic diagnosis, glucose management...

My experiences, allowed me to cover activities from early research and development to product validation, certification, user test, system, sub-system or chipset levels tests, Quality assurance and Regulatory affairs.

currentPositions.description:
Withings, major actor in digital health, thank to its connect, over the counter, medical device and various algorithmes, Withings impose itself bit by bit in the transformation of the health systems. 

As a QMS Lead, I am working to improve and maintain the Quality Management System (QMS) of the company and of one of it subsidiary (IMPETO medical) according too ISO13485, 21CFR and other medical device quality referential. Managing Non-Conformity(NC) and Corrective Action and Preventive Action (CAPA). Leading Audit from responsable authority (notify body, FDA, national health authority..)

Supporting Regulatory, Design & Development and product quality team on day to day quality activities, And using my long experience in the medical industry to give pointer and quick solution to various issue.
currentPositions.title: QARA Engineer - QMS lead

projects.description:
Conception and design of a Cipher/Decipher core with 128 bits key, following the Advanced Encryption Standard by implementing the Rijndael algorithm, and architecture for the integration on a development board Altera DE2, connected with a PS2 keyboard and a 2x16 characters LCD. 
Design of the core following the Rijndael algorithm specification
Integration and modification of third party component
Timing and functional simulation
Pipelining  

Framework: PC Windows, Altera Cyclone II , Altera Quartus II, Altera DE2 development board, Altera NIOS II.

Graded 67%
projects.title: Msc Project: Encryption System AES-128bits design

projects.description:
Study and selection of signals converters (DAC & ADC), design of the digital parts. Conversion of the analogue signals in digital, digital signals processing, application of the corrections, resynchronisation and regeneration of the analogue signals.

Framework: PC Windows, Altera Quartus II, Altera FLEX10K, Altera UP2 development board,
projects.title: BEng. Project: Volumetric Compensation System for CNC machine

fieldsOfStudy: Electronic and Computer Based Systems Design

patents.description: An implantable device includes a lead, for example for neurostimulation of the vagus nerve. The lead includes a series of stimulation electrodes and a series of external electrodes for bioimpedance measurements on blood flow located in the same region, for example on the carotid artery. The device further includes means for separating into frequency bands the measured bioimpedance signal, the bands selected to reflect different respective activities such as vasomotor activity, hemodynamic activity, respiration, and cardiac rhythm activity.
patents.title: Implantable device including a stimulation lead for bioimpedance measurement

headline: Medical Device System & Quality Engineer | Verification & Validation | Certification | QARA | EMC | Safety  // I bring Safe and Compliante Medical Device to the market
